attributes.action: Rejoin the EU to advance UK technology and strengthen economic growth.
attributes.additional_details:
ChatGPT said:
Rejoining the EU would restore the UK’s global influence, boost our economy, and secure the rights of citizens to live, work, and study across Europe. EU membership strengthens trade, science, and security cooperation. Brexit has isolated us and hindered growth. By returning, we can rebuild alliances, attract investment, and ensure a prosperous future. The UK belongs at the heart of Europe—united, influential, and forward-looking. Rejoin the EU for a stronger tomorrow.
attributes.background: As the vote to leave the EU was in 2015 there should be a new vote in late 2025 or 2026 so the younger generation will be able to make successful businesses and make things cheaper

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726413
